content.question: Which of the following characteristic memory issues is Agueda likely to experience?

choices.label: Remembering a crime she witnessed in childhood because there are too many similarities with this recent crime
Recalling her name and home address when asked by a police officer
Remembering the crime as something she saw on television instead of something she personally witnessed
Recalling the details of the crime because she cannot transfer the information from short-term to long-term memory

content.answer: Recalling the details of the crime because she cannot transfer the information from short-term to long-term memory
